item.title: How to make seemingly difficult decisions
item.description: Originally published as a Twitter thread starting here. Anyone who has spent any time in either a technical or people management leadership position in software development knows, you need to make seemingly difficult decisions all the time. This week I coached a coworker through making what seemed like a difficult decision by coaching him through the following process. Process outline Identify your options.
